csgo has the most toxic players in the world. there are only few friendly players. most toxic players are from russia for no reason and there is no option to change country in-game so if you are near russia and want to play csgo you either download vpn or dont play it. im serious you really dont wanna play with these toxic people they will ruin your game experience.
tldr dont play it if you are near russia.
Toxic game it's trash which is why I play it

Really fun game, easy to learn hard to master, recommend playing with a few friends at first before you start solo queue, unlike most games in this game smokes and nades are massive as well as micro/mechanical skills if you feel like you would enjoy a tatical fps game cs:go will definitly suit you

Boş vaktiniz varsa ve rekabet seviyorsanız mutlaka oynamanız gereken bir oyun.Oyun içi bir çok farklı oyun modu var.
Zaman geçtikçe insanın içine ve bünyesine işleyen bir hastalık gibi ne kadar oynarsan o kadar çok seni içine alıyor.Karadelik gibi mübarek bi sonu yok galiba :)
